abstract.t: This draft proposes a simple extension to HTTP, using a new set of headers, which can significantly reduce the network traffic used for sending pages containing advertising banners and other related content. We begin by describing the problems generated by the use of 'cache-busting' techniques today and why the Hit-metering scheme [RFC2227], by itself, may not be adequate. We will then describe a new scheme which relies on collaboration between the content providers and the Internet Service Providers (ISPs).
